#!/usr/bin/perl -w
open FH, "sample.txt";
$genome=<FH>;
%count=();
$count{substr($genome, $_, 2)}++ for 0..length($genome)-2;
print "AA: $count{AA}\n";
print "AG: $count{AG}\n";
print "AC: $count{AC}\n";
print "AT: $count{AT}\n";

print "TA: $count{TA}\n";
print "TG: $count{TG}\n";
print "TC: $count{TC}\n";
print "TT: $count{TT}\n";

print "GA: $count{GA}\n";
print "GG: $count{GG}\n";
print "GC: $count{GC}\n";
print "GT: $count{GT}\n";

print "CA: $count{CA}\n";
print "CG: $count{CG}\n";
print "CC: $count{CC}\n";
print "CT: $count{CT}\n";
